features: Frail Back: This character has disadvantage on strength saves and strength-based skill checks.
Strong Back: This character has advantage on strength saves and strength-based skill checks.
Poor Eyesight: This character has disadvantage on perception checks.
Sickly: This character has disadvantage on saves made to resist poison or disease.
Iron-Willed: Twice per long rest this character may re-roll a wisdom saving throw.
Great Memory: This character can accurately recall anything they saw or heard within the past week.
Natural Sprinter: This character can Dash using a bonus action.
Hideous: This character has disadvantage on charisma-based skill checks.
Uncoordinated: This character has disadvantage on dexterity saves and dexterity-based skill checks.
Uncanny Time Sense: This character has the uncanny ability to accurately tell the time of day down to the minute.
Diamond in the Rough: This character has advantage on any checks made to use tools they are proficient with.
Expert Opinion: This character has advantage on insight and history checks made involving their job or tools they are proficient with.
Appraisal: Without making a roll, this character can accurately guess the intrinsic value of items related to their job or tools they are proficient with.
Absent-Minded: This character has disadvantage on perception checks made while working.
Lazy: This character works half as fast as the average trained person performing the same task.
Industrious: This character works twice as fast as the average trained person performing the same task.
Iron-Heart Surge: Once per long rest, this character may re-roll any failed saving throw.
Action Surge: Once per short rest, this character may take an additional action on their turn.
Second Wind: Once per short rest, this character may regain 1d10 health as a bonus action.
Aggressive: Whenever this character reduces an enemy to 0 health, they may immediately move up to 30ft towards an enemy.
Tough: Once per short rest, this character may use their reaction to halve the damage they receieved from any single damage source.
Attentive: While conscious, this character cannot be surprised.
Hard to Kill: Once per long rest, this character will automatically become stablized when reduced to 0 health.
Unlucky: This character has a mortal weakness to critical hits and will die instantly when critically struck.
Flat-footed: This character has disadvantage on dexterity saves and dexterity-based skill checks.
Heart Condition: This character has disadvantage on constitution saves.
Well-Known: Other characters have advantage on checks made to identify this character and know/learn basic details about this character.
Very Charismatic: Three times per long rest, this character may re-roll a failed charisma saving throw or charisma-based skill check.
Advanced Social Tactics: Twice per short rest, this character may make another character re-roll a charisma saving throw or charisma-based skill check.
Gullible: This character has disadvantage on insight checks made to discern the truth of a statement.
Brittle Morals: This character is easily coerced through threats, bribery, or blackmail.
Skittish: This character has disadvantage on checks against intimidation and on saves against effects which would impose the Frightened condition.
Gourmand: This character's life revolves around eating, they are quick to notice anything off about food or drink and they have advantage on saves against ingested poison.
Polyglot: This character is well-versed in most languages and may unknowingly say things in different languages.
History Buff: This character is well-versed in local and regional history and can accurately recall historical facts.
Arcane Ritualist: This character can ritually cast any 1st tier Wizard ritual spells.
Divine Ritualist: This character can ritually cast any 1st tier Cleric ritual spells.
Master Ritualist: This character can ritually cast any 1st tier Wizard or Cleric ritual spells.
Cypher Specialist: this character specializes in the art of both cyphering and de-cyphering messages and has advantage on rolls to do so.
